item.description:
@russian_b wrote:

Somebody help me my server was going fine and all until i tried adding godswords then i deleted some stuff by mistake and then this kind of error would show up whenever i tried compiling!

client.java:20079: illegal start
public boolean ResetAtta
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

I know where i had made the error, here is a chunk of where it is-

}
        }

    return false;

}

public boolean ResetAttackNPC() {

	if (attacknpc > -1 && attacknpc < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs) {
		server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsUnderAttack = false;
	}
	IsAttackingNPC = false;
	attacknpc = -1;
	resetAnimation();
            pEmote = playerSE;
            faceNPC = 65535;
            faceNPCupdate = true;
	return true;

PLEASE HELP ME![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2007, 10:10:16 PM[/size][hr]Help please!
